original_text: The Levite priests receive gifts, and they are people who one day will die. Melchizedek also received gifts, but we are told that he continues to live. 9-
korean_text: 또 여기는 죽을 자들이 십분의 일을 받으나 저기는 산다고 증거를 얻은 자가 받았느니라

sentences.original_text: and they are people who one day will die
but we are told that he continues to live
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 우리는 그가 계속 살고 있다고 들었습니다
